tutorial: Testing a Trading Idea - The Other Stages

definition.text: We are on a new chart! Let's set it up so that we may see the results of the backtest!

translations.text: Wir befinden uns in einem neuen Chart! Richten wir ihn so ein, dass wir die Ergebnisse des Backtests sehen können!
Özet: Yeni bir grafik üzerindeyiz! Geriye dönük testin sonuçlarını görebilmemiz için ayarlayalım!
Мы находимся на новом графике! Давайте настроим его так, чтобы мы могли увидеть результаты бэктеста!

paragraphs.text: Turn on the following layers in each of the layer managers (feel free to close all plotter panels):

translations.text: Schalten Sie die folgenden Ebenen in den Ebenenmanagern ein (Sie können auch alle Plotter-Panels schließen)
Katman yöneticilerinin her birinde aşağıdaki katmanları açın (öncesinde tüm çizici panellerini kapatabilirsiniz):
Включите следующие слои в каждом из менеджеров слоев (не забудьте закрыть все панели плоттера):

paragraphs.text: Simulation Objects: "Strategies", "Market Buy Orders", "Market Sell Orders", "Position Base Asset", "Stop Loss", and "Take Profit".

translations.text: Simülasyon Nesneleri(Simulation Objects): (Strategies)"Stratejiler", ( Market Buy Orders)"Piyasa Alım Emirleri",(Market Sell Orders) "Piyasa Satış Emirleri",(Position Base Asset) "Pozisyon Baz Varlık",(Stop Loss) "Zararı Durdur" ve (Take Profit) "Kâr Al".
Simulation Objects: "Strategies", "Market Buy Orders", "Market Sell Orders", "Position Base Asset", "Stop Loss", и "Take Profit".

paragraphs.text: Trading System: "Trading System Errors" and "Trading System Warnings".

translations.text: Trading System: "Trading System Errors" und "Trading System Warnings".
İşlem Sistemi(Trading System): (Trading System Errors)"İşlem Sistemi Hataları" ve (Trading System Warnings)"İşlem Sistemi Uyarıları".
Trading System: "Trading System Errors" и "Trading System Warnings".

paragraphs.text: The next step shows what you should see!

translations.text: Der nächste Schritt zeigt, was Sie sehen sollten!
İpucu: Bir sonraki adım, ne görmeniz gerektiğini gösteriyor!
Следующий шаг показывает, что вы должны увидеть!
